name: Wunderlist 2 Print Bookmarklet
body:
## Turns this:

![Before](http://i49.tinypic.com/v80t4h.jpg)

## Into this:

![After](http://i46.tinypic.com/rjjfp2.jpg)

(The red bar on top won't be printed, of course. It allows you to refresh the page to the original layout.)
tagline: The new Wunderlist 2 does not offer (optimized) print support at the moment. Until this feature goes life within the next releases, you can use this bookmarklet to get a decent looking print version.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
